ramen.name: Nongshim Shin Original
ramen.description: A generous portion of thick chewy noodles paired with a bold comforting broth that features a rich, umami taste with layers of beefy warmth, aromatic garlic, sweet onion, as well as subtle hints of mushroom and soy sauce.
ramen.allergen: Please refer to each product's packaging for detailed allergen information.
ramen.suggested_toppings:
Protein: Hard-boiled egg or Korean smokies
Veggie: Bok choy or corn
Hack ingredient (optional): Mayonnaise or sesame paste
FREE garnishes (optional): Green onion, jalapenos, red radish, cilantro

ramen.name: Nongshim Shin Black
ramen.description: Similar to the classic Shin Original, but with a creamier broth that draws extra richness from premium beef bone stock, enhanced garlic, and an added kick from black garlic oil for a smoother, more luxurious finish.
ramen.allergen: Please refer to each product's packaging for detailed allergen information.

ramen.name: Nongshim Shin Light
ramen.description: A lighter take on Shin Original's spicy beefy mushroom flavors, Shin Light has fewer calories and less fat, with non-fried, springy noodles and extra vegetables for a fresh twist.

ramen.name: Nongshim Kimchi
ramen.description: A noticeable but not overwhelming current of tangy, fermented kimchi flavor—bright and slightly sour up front, with a gentle heat that builds as you slurp. It's got that savory depth, a hint of seafood extract, and a satisfying balance of vegetable bits for texture.

ramen.name: Ottogi Jin Mild
ramen.description: A generous portion of chubby, chewy noodles served with a gentle beef-based broth that's layered with veggies, mushroom, and a caramelized onion note.  Its comforting mellow taste feels both homey and satisfying without the extra heat, making this ramyun a versatile hack option.

ramen.name: Ottogi Jin Spicy
ramen.description: A bountiful amount of smooth, springy noodles served in a flavorful beef-based broth that delivers a lively chili warmth rather than othe verwhelming heat of its Nongshim counterpart. Accented with aromatic garlic, sweet onion, and earthy mushroom, this price-friendly ramyun is a dependable choice for a more cozy yet still satisfying kick.

ramen.name: Jin Cheesy Ramen
ramen.description: A saucy noodle that fuses classic Korean ramyun chewiness with ultra-creamy mac & cheese vibes — think bold cheddar and smooth mascarpone melting into a thick, flavorful sauce that clings to every strand.

ramen.description: Springy noodz soaked in a lightly beefy broth upgraded with rich, melty cheddar cheese — creating a cozy, creamy soup that's mildly spicy and ultra-slurpable.

ramen.name: Paldo Spicy Seafood
ramen.description: Thick, chewy noodles swimming in a bold, deep-red broth — packed with intense gochugaru heat and seafood umami, plus a hint of smoky roasted flavor from the signature spicy oil.

ramen.name: Buldak Original
ramen.description: A fiery stir-fry ramen with chewy noodles drenched in a bold, intensely spicy sauce. The addictive sweet-heat flavor is layered with hints of savory chicken and aromatic garlic, delivering a powerful, lingering kick that thrill-seekers and spice lovers crave.

ramen.name: Buldak 2X Spicy
ramen.description: A supercharged stir-fry ramen featuring extra-springy noodles coated in an intense, fiery red sauce that packs double the heat of the original. Its explosive profile is layered with savory chicken, deep soy notes, and a touch of sweet garlic, delivering a bold, sweat-inducing thrill for true spice enthusiasts.

ramen.name: Buldak Carbonara
ramen.description: A creamy twist on Buldak's original fire noodles, this stir-fry ramen combines chewy noodles with a velvety sauce that blends bold Korean heat with smooth, cheesy creaminess.  Accented by savory chicken and a dash of garlic, it offers a spicy yet comforting experience that has become a global favorite among adventurous noodle fans.

ramen.name: Buldak Rosé Ramen
ramen.description: This saucy ramyun coats bouncy noodles in a creamy rosé elixir that balances bold Korean spice with subtle tomato tang and rich dairy smoothness. Savory chicken notes and a slightly smoky sweetness round out its delightful profile.

ramen.name: Buldak Taco Spicy Ramen
ramen.description: A bold fusion of Buldak's signature heat with Mexican-inspired taco seasoning — bouncy noodles tossed in a savory blend of chili, cumin, and other herbs. It's milder than the original Buldak but still delivers a spicy, smoky, taco-forward punch.
ramen.allergen: Please refer to each product's packaging for detailed allergen information.

ramen.name: Sapporo Ichiban Tonkotsu
ramen.description: A more approachable take on classic tonkotsu, Sapporo Ichiban's version features a balanced, mildly creamy pork broth that's lighter and subtly sweet, making it easy to enjoy for all palates. The familiar curly noodles soak up the savory broth beautifully, offering an affordable choice that still feels satisfying and special.

ramen.name: Sapporo Ichiban Miso
ramen.description: An inviting bowl of springy noodles served in a delicate miso broth made from a blend of six different miso varieties and mixed vegetables. This classic Japanese ramen offers a smooth, mellow umami depth that clearly distincts itself from the bold, fiery taste of Korean ramyun.  Yet the seven-spice chili seasoning does deliver a gentle kick that ties all the flavors beautifully together.

ramen.name: Sapporo Chow Mein
ramen.description: A delectable instant version of the enduring Chinese stir-fried noodles, reimagined in Japanese style. It offers a medley of sweet and savory flavors with its rich, Worcestershire-inspired sauce and bouncy noodles — a comforting, nostalgic taste ready for a hack boost.

Perfect for anyone craving a flavorful stir-fry noodle with a modern, tangy edge.

ramen.name: Kurata Tonkotsu (2 servings)
ramen.description: A premium, restaurant-grade tonkotsu ramen featuring Hakata-style thin noodles and a luscious, creamy pork broth. Crafted for depth and balance, each pack delivers two satisfying servings for an elevated, authentic ramen experience. Note: Cook each serving separately or cook second serving at home.

ramen.name: A-Sha Style with Original Soy Sauce
ramen.description: Hugely popular in the soy sauce noodles category, this option features A-Sha's famous air-dried wheat flour noodles with a superior chewy texture that stands out even more in this wide cut format.  It's drenched in a refined soy sauce seasoning that highlights subtle umami rather than overpowering the palate, letting the noodz shine as the true star.

ramen.name: A-Sha Hakka Style Noodles with Chili Sauce
ramen.description: These Hakka-style wide noodles showcase A-Sha's iconic air-dried chewy texture, with extra surface area that enhances their satisfying bounce. They're paired with a fragrant chili sauce that delivers a gentle, well-rounded heat and savory depth, allowing the noodles to shine while adding just the right kick to keep each bite exciting.

ramen.name: A-Sha Hello Kitty Noodles with Supercute Soy Sauce
ramen.description: Add a dash of playful charm to every bite with these adorable Hello Kitty Mandarin-style noodles!  Featuring A-Sha's famous air-dried chew in a fun, wide shape, they're paired with a sweet-savory soy sauce that's gentle, comforting, and never spicy — perfect for little taste buds (and big kids at heart).  A cute and tasty way to make every slurp extra special!

ramen.name: Mom's SurfMama Onion & Shrimp
ramen.description: Premium chewy noodles tossed in a rich, aromatic scallion oil infused with golden dried shrimp and fresh scallions, plus a savory soy-based sauce for deep umami flavor. A top Taiwanese option among experienced foodies.

ramen.name: Indomie Mi Goreng Original
ramen.description: A beloved Indonesian street food that has earned its place as the world's best selling instant noodle, Indomie delights global tastebuds with its lightly chewy noodles coated in an addictive sweet-savory sauce made from five flavorful seasoning sachets.  Enjoy its compact size as a quick snack, or double up for a satisfying meal.

ramen.name: Indomie Mi Goreng Hot & Spicy
ramen.description: A twist on Indomie's popular original Mi Goreng, this Hot & Spicy version turns up the heat slightly while keeping that signature sweet-savory balance created with five distinctive seasoning sachets. The bouncy noodz come in a compact packet, though many Indomie fans love doubling up for an even more satisfying, fiery feast.

ramen.name: Mama Shrimp Tom Yum
ramen.description: A go-to choice from Thailand, Mama Shrimp Creamy Tom Yum noodle offers that unmistakable spicy-sour kick, balanced with a rich, creamy finish that makes every slurp irresistible.  The springy noodles soak up a fragrant broth layered with lemongrass, lime, and chili, while a subtle shrimp note ties it all together.  Perfect for anyone craving bold, Thai flavors in a comforting bowl.

ramen.name: Mama Green Curry
ramen.description: Inspired by the comforting warmth of Thai green curry, this selection highlights the real taste of creamy coconut milk, balanced with aromatic lemongrass, herbs, and gentle chili heat. The springy noodles soak up a rich, velvety broth layered with earthy spices and a subtle sweetness that keeps each bite exciting.  Ideal for anyone in the mood for a quick yet authentic Thai curry experience.

ramen.name: Mama Tom Kha Coconut
ramen.description: Impressive springy noodles soak up that iconic Tom Kha soup—rich coconut and aromatic herbs like lemongrass and galangal balanced with tangy lime-like brightness. It's all the comforting flavors of Thailand.

ramen.name: Prima Taste Singapore Curry
ramen.description: Considered a gold standard of instant noodles, Prima Taste Laksa LaMian transforms an everyday meal into a luxurious treat. Thick, springy air-dried noodles deliver a gourmet bite that rivals fresh ramen shops, while the rich, creamy curry broth explodes with real coconut milk, aromatic spices, and deep seafood umami. Yes, this Singaporean laksa is a premium choice — but social media fans agree: once you taste it, you'll understand why it's worth every slurp.
